channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned shopping trolley, 26th November
item.description:
Shopping trolley currently sitting inside the gate of the KGV playing fields on Bedford Avenue
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 45 Buckingham Avenue, Cheltenham

item.description:
Massive pot hole on left hand side of A40. Is very deep.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 22 Campden Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Rubbish on street, 26th November
item.description:
Houses are not putting their bins in and dumping open bags

item.title: Flooding of path in town centre, 25th November
item.description:
Flooding outside Boots. Puddle! very deep and causing issues for shoppers.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 192 194 High Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 25th November
item.description:
Blocked drain

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Larkhay Road, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Green Barriers- fibre optic work, 24th November
item.description:
Everyday the green barriers, used where the fibre optic work is being done, are blown over, causing an obstruction and posing a danger. The photos are of Oldbury Rd, Oldbury Close and the entrance to Falkland Place (where gaps in the pavement covers pose an extra risk to pedestrians and cyclists). These barriers are not fit for purpose. In addition the management of traffic where work is taking place is extremely unsatisfactory, leading to grid lock at busy periods. GCC please inspect whats in place and enforce proper management.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Farm Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sainsbury's, 24th November
item.description:
Another trolley in the same road! What's going on?!?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 168 River Leys, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sainsbury's, 24th November
item.description:
Shopping trolley
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 50 Coppice Gate, Cheltenham

item.title: Deep pothole between EG entrance and Junction, 24th November
item.description:
Pothole not visible until past mini roundabout so not well sighted and should be fixed as a priority.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 107 Old Bath Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drainage causing pavement flooding, 23rd November
item.description:
Drains blocked downstream causing water to emit from the drain and cause road and pavement flooding toward town The drain is out side 213 Prestbury road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 213 Prestbury Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More potholes have opened up and gotten deeper in Pothole alley!, 23rd November
item.description:
This area is effectively one big pothole with potholes getting potholes! Some of the existing and filled in potholes have gotten deeper and are making driving through this piece of road difficult. Please can the potholes be filled in or better still, this section of road resurfaced - it saves damaging the off road edges which have to be used to avoid the potholes!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes before and after this corner, 23rd November
item.description:
There are at least 3 potholes around this corner starting from the the entry to it and again on the exit. They are in the wheel track of vehicles entering and exiting this corner and have gotten deep with sharp edges. Please can they be filled in.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hewletts Farm Aggs Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Continuous puddles, 23rd November
item.description:
The road surface here is uneven and has been since it was resurfaced. There are always big puddles either side of the entrance to Moorcourt Drive making it difficult to cross from one pavement to the other
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 Pittville Circus Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road riddled with unsafe potholes, 23rd November
item.description:
The potholes have been here for months. I do not feel safe having my children cycle down the road due to the myriad of potholes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Saint Anne's Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Inadequate drainage, 23rd November
item.description:
This stretch of the A417 has no drainage between the two roundabouts. As a result, significant amounts of water collects near the grass central reservation (on the road towards the air balloon), which makes the outside lane at times, hazardous and causes aquaplaning.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 20 Gilpin Avenue, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Routine Parking on Pavement, 22nd November
item.description:
Vans routinely parking on Pavement/Double yellows.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Garages Hailes Street, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped sandbags on pavement, 22nd November
item.description:
Christ Church Road - adjacent to traffic light junction with A40 Lansdown Road. 2 sandbags dumped on pavement a few metres along Christ Church Road (close to traffic lights). 1 bag is split open. Need removing, and sand clearing up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Ablington Lansdown Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lampost rusting, 22nd November
item.description:
Paint has peeled away on the lampost and it has started to rust
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 82 Hewlett Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Super large &deep potholes along length of road, 22nd November
item.description:
This section of road is ignored when potholes are done. This road is used by a constant stream of vehicles and drivers. This road has been in this state for over a year and getting worse with the constant rain.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Coberley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Barriers for cable works!!!!, 21st November
item.description:
Thr green barrier supposedly being used for "safety" are over all along Oldbury Road and Oldbury Close and also near Falkland Place. These barriers are not fit for purpose and in some instances create more of a hazzard than if they weren't there. I've reported this issue previously and Highways need to police these works, the safety measures put in place (or not) and the way traffic is managed as the works cause grid locks again and again.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 110 Hester's Way Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
